articles.author: Adrian Kingsley-Hughes
articles.title: The 7 tech gadgets I couldn't live without in 2024 - ZDNet
articles.description: I reviewed a bewildering array of gadgets this year. Here are the few that became essential parts of my kit. (No Apple gear included.)
articles.content:
Adrian Kingsley-Hughes/ZDNET
I handle and review a bewildering array of gadgets throughout the year, from cables to satellite communicators. However, I feel that the real test for any product is whe… [+5706 chars]
